Literature.Title: Systematic study of non-natural short cationic lipopeptides as novel broad-spectrum antimicrobial agents.
Literature.Author: Lohan S, Cameotra SS, Bisht GS

Literature.Title: In vitro and in vivo antibacterial evaluation and mechanistic study of ornithine based small cationic lipopeptides against antibiotic resistant clinical isolates.
Literature.Author: Lohan S, Monga J, Cameotra SS, Bisht GS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli MTCC 723(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa MTCC 2295(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MTCC 3160(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis MTCC 2763(MIC=25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC BAA-1720(MIC=25µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 51625(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 24433(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Aspergillus fumigatus ATCC 42203(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Aspergillus niger ATCC 64028(MIC=1.5µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 2344(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=6.5-10.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=4.5-10.5µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae(MIC=2.5-10µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium(MIC=6.2-12.5µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=4.5-15µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=5-7.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=2.5-5µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=4-12.5µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=7.5-10µg/ml),Haemophilus Influenzae(MIC=10-15µg/ml)
